extendedInfo.description: With the PNC SmartAccessÂ®Prepaid VisaÂ® Card mobile app from PNC Bank, you can now access your prepaid card information from your mobile device! This application is free to download and makes it easy for you to bank on the go!Once youâve created a secure passcode for logging on, youâll have access to: *View balance *View transaction history *Suspend or reactivate cards *Manage alerts *Request balance information via text message Your security is our priority. Mobile data transmissions and card information are protected by 128-bit encryption, just like they are when you bank online. Experience the freedom of mobile banking in the palm of your hands! IMPORTANT: During the enrollment process, please do not close out of this application while awaiting the activation code. It will appear as an SMS/text message within 2 minutes and then must be entered into the application to complete your enrollment.PNC SmartAccess is a registered trademark of The PNC Financial Services Group, Inc. VISA is a registered trademark of Visa International Service Association and used under license.Â©2013 The PNC Financial Services Group, Inc. All rights reserved. PNC Bank, National Association. reviews.title: App
reviews.comment: Downloaded app and now says service unavailable try again later.
reviews.author: jonathan bryant

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Good app but a pain to set up.  Have to remember about 3 different security passcodes.  Pain but grezt once set up
reviews.author: Herbert Smith

reviews.title: pain to install
reviews.comment: This is the most ridiculas  app , Go through all the steps and whhen done  took 3 x  because kept saying system unavailable  try again later.  This was ater spending 1.5 hours on the phone with PNC  and they had no idea about this app.
reviews.author: Darrell Hudiburgh

reviews.title: Works fine..
reviews.comment: A good little app here.. had no problems wIth it
reviews.author: Adrian Greer

reviews.title: Not working on S4
reviews.comment: Never had problems with this application before until now (used to be a 5star app). It continues to say server cannot be found check Internet etc.  However, please fix and I\'ll give it 5 starz.....
reviews.author: Samir Washington

reviews.title: Wtf
reviews.comment: Downloaded and can\'t set up for some reason. It says don\'t close app when waiting on text to sign on.... But it closes when the text comes in. Stupid!!!
reviews.author: seniel jones

reviews.title: Do something
reviews.comment: This app is ridoculos..i had to send the varification code to another phone just to enter it....i will not redownload this...its a pain..seriously!
reviews.author: Nicole Anderson

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: Activation code never sends...plus you have to keep the app open until it sends..guess I won\'t be using this or even be able to get it started...to keep up with my money
reviews.author: Bria Miller

reviews.title: Worst ever
reviews.comment: This is the worst app ever. React my password several times verified my email several times and still unlocked my account 7 times and still can\'t access my account.
reviews.author: Nicole Goodwin

reviews.title: App needs updating...
reviews.comment: Surprised this works with cm 10.1, app is buggy and hard to use, make our monthly fee worth something.
reviews.author: Ismael Severino

reviews.title: Worst bank ever
reviews.comment: Closed my account month ago. And charged me 10 for a paper statement no one ever told me !!
reviews.author: Nicole Cullen

reviews.comment: Have installed,uninstalled, and re installedseveral times. Cant even open the app. It just says \"can not connect. Try again later\"
reviews.author: aaron sadler

reviews.title: Sucks!! It never connects to server
reviews.comment: This application is the worst!! I\'ve tried several times too log in and it always says server not available. . This is crazy! And all my other apps have no problems.
reviews.author: Keyona Lowery

reviews.title: Junk app
reviews.comment: This app is junk it gave me a code to enter and after that all it would do is can\'t connect. Will be easier to just call the number on the card and ck balance or talk to customer service than deal with this. Don\'t recommend it. Only gave it a star cause had to.
reviews.author: Roger Whitehouse

reviews.title: This is stupid
reviews.comment: I had a galaxy S3 and this app worked fine, now on my S4 it only lets me download the app and then when I try and open it it says service unavailable, I called PNC and they said it was because my numbers changed so when I updated my account with my new phone # it still doesn\'t work. FIX IT
reviews.author: Kimberly Williams

reviews.title: Irritated app doesn\'t work, how do I even report a problem?
reviews.comment: Used app all the time on galaxy s3 now on new galaxy s4 it says service is unavailable but I dont see anything saying its not compatible with my new phone otherwise I wouldn\'t be able to download it! WHAT GIVES?
reviews.author: Kerry Smith

reviews.title: Galaxy s4
reviews.comment: Will not load up at all even if I uninstall it do you have to be on wifi?
reviews.author: Crystal Duncan

reviews.title: Messed up don\'t work
reviews.comment: I got this app and it won\'t send the activation code for nothing
reviews.author: Rodney Simpson

reviews.title: Nice feature
reviews.comment: Like all the security around it. Easy to use and nicely designed.
reviews.author: Matt Canetto

reviews.title: Works great.
reviews.comment: Work\'s great.
